韘字的基本解释

韘
shè
古代射箭时戴在手上的扳指：“虽则佩韘，能不我甲。”

韘
xiè
古通“渫”，疏浚。

韘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shè］
［《廣韻》書涉切，入葉，書。］
［《廣韻》蘇協切，入帖，心。］
亦作“弽1”。
(1)古代射箭用具。象骨或晶玉制成，套在右手拇指上用以钩弦。也称玦、决，俗称扳指。
(2)见“韘”。
(3)通“渫”。疏通；疏浚。

韘字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韘； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1394第33
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?失涉切，音攝。【說文】射決也，所以鉤弦。以象骨、韋系著右巨指。从韋枼聲。【玉篇】指沓也。【詩·衞風】童子佩韘。【傳】韘，玦也。能射御則帶韘。【箋】韘之言沓，所以彄沓手指。【集韻】或作弽。　又【廣韻】蘇協切【集韻】悉協切，?音燮。【廣韻】韘韝，射具。　又【集韻】䪓韘，帶具。

韘
Basic explanation of words
韘
shè
The finger that was worn on the hand during archery in ancient times: "Although it is worn, it can't be my arm."
韘
xiè
Ancient pass "Xue", dredging.
韘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shè]
["Guangyun" book involves cutting, entering leaves, book. ]
["Guang Yun" Su Xie cut, enter the post, heart. ]
Also known as "弽1".
(1) Ancient archery equipment. It is made of elephant bone or crystal jade, and is put on the right thumb for hooking strings. Also known as Jue and Jue, commonly known as pull finger.
(2) See "韘".
(3) Through "渫". Dredge; dredge.
韘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji] [Wei Zi Department] 　韘; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1394 33
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Lost and cut, sound recording. [Said the text] Shooting is also a good shot, so hook the string. With elephant bone and Wei tied his right giant finger. From Wei Fangsheng. [Jade articles] Refers to Ta also. 【Poetry·Weifeng】The boy Peiyun. [Biography] Yun, Jun Ye. If you can shoot Yu, you will have a bun. 【Jian】Yun's words are awkward, so the fingers are awkward. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo Yu.　[Guangyun] Su Xieqie [Jiyun] Xi Xieqie,? Yinxie. 【Guang Yun】韘韝, shooting equipment.　[Jiyun] Qin Yun, bring with you.
